name: Fast Race Sport Car 2
description:
Fast Race Sport Car 2 is the best car racing game all around the world. Drift around city scene with best sporting car and have realistic physics. Crazy drift is started, racing with your friends together.
Features:
- Beautiful Scene of Dubai racing
- Racing in different events
- Most unique, thrilling, super fast
- Easy to control, Only to tilt the phone
- Real cars, real competition
